description:
With all thats happening, they thought we’d be distracted!
Let us not forget what their plan is!
How does the optional RFID chip work?... It will be optional but a lot of buildings won’t let you in unless you have one. The whole “must wear a mask to enter” was just a public reaction test to see if people would comply. A 2nd wave of coronavirus will hit so people will have to take the vaccination and then big corp businesses will require people to have the chip to enter their buildings!
Bil Gates wants to digitize people’s vaccination record and create a real time tracking system.  That sounds like #MICROCHIP!
It will seem like we have a free choice when we really don’t. They know they can’t physically force us to get one, but they’ll use scare tactics and blackmail. Such as “Your child cannot enroll into this school until they get their vaccinations.” But, we knew this was coming. We knew that the coronavirus was a scam to force everyone to take the COVID(certification of vaccine ID) under Agenda 2020. Beware, this could very be what people are calling “the #markoftheBeast”, ❗️❗️❗️
